title: Inception
description: A thief who steals secrets through dream-sharing tech is offered redemption.
fullDescription: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance to erase his past.

title: Interstellar
description: A team travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to save humanity.
fullDescription: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanityâ€™s survival.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulation and joins a rebellion.
fullDescription: A hacker discovers the world is a simulation and joins a rebellion to fight its controllers.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school.
fullDescription: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school, where he makes friends and faces dark forces.

title: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A hobbit and his friends embark on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.
fullDescription: A hobbit and his friends embark on a quest to destroy a powerful ring that could bring darkness to Middle-earth.
